**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 46 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41 [Mafika Ayuwari](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1496) **Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 38 **Perception** +29 **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43) **Skills** [Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +32, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +34, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +30, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +30, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +32 **Str** +0 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +4 **Items** _[bracers of armor III](/Equipment.aspx?ID=416)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_ --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +29 **Will** +29 **HP** 250 **Brilliant Wordplay** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [primal [reaction]](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Trigger** Mafika is the target of a [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) effect; **Effect** Mafika attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the effect (counteract modifier +30). If he counteracts the effect, he can use that effect on a new target of his choice within 30 feet.
**Tempest-Sun Shielding** Mafika transforms unrealized spell energy into a protective shield; **Trigger** Mafika or an ally within 30 feet takes damage; **Effect** Mafika expends a prepared spell in a spell slot. He reduces the triggering damage by four times the spell slot's level. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _staff_ +28 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-handed 3d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 3d4+6 bludgeoning **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 41, attack +33 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Alarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) - **2nd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136) (×2), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210) - **3rd** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309), [Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) (×2), [Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255) - **5th** [Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23) (×2), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) - **6th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123), [Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199), [Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331) - **7th** [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Reverse Gravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=261), [Spell Turning](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) - **8th** [Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224), [Power Word Stun](/Spells.aspx?ID=228), [Punishing Winds](/Spells.aspx?ID=240) - **9th** [Foresight](/Spells.aspx?ID=127), [Meteor Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=191), [Summon Elemental](/Spells.aspx?ID=320) **Druid Order Spells** DC 41, 2 Focus Points - **9th** [Impaling Briars](/Spells.aspx?ID=475), [Tempest Surge](/Spells.aspx?ID=479) **Halcyon Surge** Mafika casts an arcane spell that takes 2 actions or fewer to Cast, then casts a druid order spell that takes 2 actions or fewer to Cast (paying 1 Focus Point, as normal). **Shift Spell** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Requirements** Mafika has an area spell active with a remaining duration and he is within the spell's range; **Effect** Mafika moves the spell's area to a new point of origin. The spell's remaining duration is reduced by half. Instantaneous or permanent effects of the spell (such as damage or healing) are unaffected and aren't repeated.
